MeDonate: All funds raised will go towards the next game's development!
MeIntro: Good day! ^ As you can see, I'm hunkered up here in the corner making video games. Little by little, but progress is progress! However, as you've heard, development is getting more expensive as time goes on, so I had to start a crowdfunding campaign. Fifty bucks would really help me out.
MeThanks: Thanks for the donation! ^ It's time to get to work!
